cause.description:
This cause is meant to spread the word and to help stop the spread of AIDS!!There is a cure and with the proper amount of funding and support it will be found!! With your help we can help to find the cure to a worldwide epidemic!
1. Although HIV is not deadly AIDS is and eventually all HIV patients are destined for AIDS this needs to stop!
2. There is a solution to every problem INCLUDING a cure to AIDS/HIV!!
3. Donating money towards this cause will help researchers in their research towards AIDS!
cause.mission: Raise money to put toward funding research to find a cure for AIDS/HIV!!
cause.name: Stop AIDS!!!
